title: Never received a gift from friend
body: My friend recently tried to gift me Yasuo, it has been about 1 week and i have not received it yet and i sent a ticket in about 3 days ago and no response their either. I would like to receive it or at least give my friend a refund since he spent real money on it. If you need a picture for proof i can attach one later.

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that you have a ticket currently in queue.  There's currently a bit of a wait, so it may take a few moments for a response.  We'll respond asap!

http://imgur.com/a/IWPrd
http://imgur.com/a/erx48
Here are the 2 pictures for proof

We did another test and for some reason, where we choose which username to send the gift to there is two of my username i only have this one account we sent one to each of the accounts and only one of them worked so we have been sending the champs or something to a glitched account or something.
